article_title: CoOportinuty Health Isn't An Obamacare Problem, It's A Cooperative Problem

article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall

og.description: It's fair to say that I'm not a great fan of Obamacare: I'm along with the thoroughly libertarian Mike Munger in thinking that even single payer would be better than this lash up of a system. However, it's also worth being fair about this system, as it is worth being [...]
